summary: The little Nansal finds a baby dog in the Mongolian veld, who becomes her best friend against all rejections of her parents.
cast: Batchuluun Urjindorj|Buyandulam Daramdadi|Nansal Batchuluun|Nansalmaa Batchuluun|Batbayar Batchuluun|Tserenpuntsag Ish|Scharav Sumiya|Battur Lhamsuren|Batjargal Ulzidelger
title: El perro mongol
